== Ubuntu Linux In Second Life ==

This Loco Team is not an in real world team, but a team in Second Life.  

The purpose of our Second Life  group is to contact with Ubuntu Linux users in Second Life and to promote Ubuntu Linux in this virtual world.

Our team consists of a group of people that are working on promoting Ubuntu In Second Life. The group is called Ubuntu Linux and so far over 800 members have joined this group.  

More info on the Ubuntu Linux group in SL you can find here: [url]https://ubuntulinux.wikidot.com/start[/url]
